price: außer denjenigen, die bereuen, bevor ihr Macht über sie habt. So wisset, daß Allah Allvergebend und Barmherzig ist.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُواْ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن تَقۡدِرُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna tābū min qabli an taqdirū ʿalayhim fa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
